snippet.title: Blood Opera Crescendo (2019) -  Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Kickstarter campaign trailer for Blood Opera Crescendo, adventure game in development by the italian studio Kibou Entertainment using RPG Maker MV! 

Kickstarter campaign: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/bloodopera/blood-opera-crescendo
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/KibouEntertainment
Twitter: http://twitter.com/KibouEntertainm
